highRiskSubtitle.en: LDL-C goal is < 70 mg/dL and 50% reduction from baseline

veryHighRiskSubtitle.en: LDL-C goal is < 55 mg/dL and 50% reduction from baseline

ascvdTitle.en: Step 1: Evidence of established Atherosclerotic CardioVascular Disease (ASCVD)?

revascularizationLabel.en: Undergone revascularization procedures (PCI, CABG, or other arterial revascularization)

angioLabel.en: Significant plaque on angiography or CT scan (usually at least 50% stenosis)

carotidLabel.en: Significant plaque on carotid ultrasound (usually at least 50% stenosis)

dmSubtitle.en: Does your patient have Diabetes Mellitus (DM)?

majorAscvdRiskFactorsTitle.en: Other Major ASCVD Risk factors? (check all that apply)

familyLabel.en: Family history of premature coronary disease (usually ealier than 55 for men, 60 for women)

onsetDurationTitle.en: Onset and Duration (choose one that best describes your patient)

youngRecentLabel.en: Young patients (less than 35 for T1DM, less than 50 for T2DM) with LESS than 10 years duration

longLabel.en: DM with AT LEAST 10 years duration

t1dmLabel.en: T1DM of long duration (more than 20 years)

ckdSubtitle.en: Does your patient have known CKD? (leave empty if No)

severeCkdLabel.en: Yes - Severe CKD (eGFR less than 30 mL/min/1.73m²)

moderateCkdLabel.en: Yes - Moderate CKD (eGFR between 30 and 60 mL/min/1.73m²)

eGfrFindLabel.en: I don't know eGFR, let's calulate

eGfrFindDescription.en: eGFR estimation is based on CKD-EPI (2021), without race coefficient

creatinineAgeGenderMissing.en: Please enter correct creatinine, age and gender values

additionalDataTitle.en: Step 4: Additional data needed for risk estimation

additionalDataSubtitle.en: No established ASCVD or Diabetes. 10 year CV risk estimation and checking for markedly elevated single risk factors
